concept.title: Plotter Manager
concept.shortdesc: Plotter Manager is a window in which all the plotter configuration (PC5) files of user installation are listed. If you want to use ZWCAD default plotting properties other than that of Windows system configured, you can also create a new plotter configuration files for Windows system plotter. Plotter configuration settings contain port information, quality of raster images and vector drawings, drawing size and customized properties based on the plotter type.

conbody.p: The user can start an Add Plotter - Introduction Page dialog box by selecting Add New Plotters option from the Name pull-down boxin Printer/Plotter area on Plot dialog box, which is available for creating plotter configuration using relevant information that is imported as this wizard required.
